mapper.insert: insert into evaluate (missionid, publishid, executorid, publish_evaluate, executor_evaluate, publish_score, executor_score, evaluatetime) values (#{missionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishEvaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executorEvaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{executorScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{evaluatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select missionid, publishid, executorid, publish_evaluate, executor_evaluate, publish_score, executor_score, evaluatetime from evaluate
